TEXT.S: Christopher Abbott kawas tay 1986, nqu tay 2, Christopher Abbott, squliq na Bunge'. qyanux na sraral Abbott htgan na ryax maki Greenwich, Connecticut. hiya ga mhtuw ega' maki Amirika. cyux qutux qbsuyan kneril,Christina lalu nya. Christopher Abbott cyux itali ru putawyaramu. raral ga,hiya qnxan beh Chickahominy. 2006 kawas musa maki New York.sobih pqwasan biru.
